title: Barclays contactless payments not working
content:
Hi, I have been using the Barclays Mobile Banking App for contactless payments for well over a year with no issues. All of a sudden, payments are being declined at the merchants side. 
The app gives a payments sent notification but the merchant terminal then declines.
I have been in contact with Barclays and they have no issues. The debit card for the account works fine. I have reinstalled the app a number of times and ensured all setting are correct. 

I have been having this problem for a couple of weeks now. any advice?
I would switch to Google Pay but Barclays dont support Android.

thanks
